sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-buttons slot="start">
      <ion-menu-button></ion-menu-button>
      <ion-title>Crear mi mascota</ion-title>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
  <ion-list lines="full">
    <form [formGroup]="pacienteForm" (ngSubmit)="savePaciente()"> 

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Nombre</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="nombre"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Número de celular</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="numCel"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Nombre de la mascota</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="nombreMascota"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Edad de la mascota</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="edadMascota"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Tipo de mascota</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="tipoMascota"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Raza de la mascota</ion-label>
        <ion-input placeholder="" formControlName="razaMascota"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>


      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="primary" shape="full" expand="block">Crear cliente</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="danger" shape="full" expand="block" routerLink="/home">Cancelar</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
    </form>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
